DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate impact pharmacist behavioral intervention 's influence breast cancer patient ' quality life . Croatian randomize controlled trial . Targeted population : general population breast cancer patient first adjuvant anthracycline chemotherapy . Primary outcome : difference EORTC QLQ-BR23 questionnaire result baseline 3 week cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacist 's Influence Breast Cancer Patient Quality Life
DOC.criteria: Early breast cancer First adjuvant chemotherapy Chemotherapy protocol : anthracycline x 4 Cardiovascular comorbidities Regular nausea vomit six month enrollment Unable answer quality life questionnaire
